meaningMnemonic: You've seen 私立, which is "private," and you've seen 大学, which is "college" or "university." So, combine them together and you have a <vocabulary>private college</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>private university</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: If you know the readings of the words 私立 and 大学 you'll be able to read this. It's also all jukugo on'yomi readings too, so you can read it that way.
